title: Tactical Shotgun
summaries: The Tactical Shotgun is a Hardmode, post-Plantera ranged weapon. It is an upgraded version of the Shotgun, auto-firing six spread shots per bullet consumed (against the Shotgun's average of four), for a possible combined base damage of 174 per bullet spent (not including bullet damage stats which are then added). It has a 8.33*1/12 (8.33%) / 15.97*23/144 (15.97%) chance to drop from Tactical Skeletons in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

statistics.Sell: 8 GC
